description: Kazuma Kuwabara is the second toughest student in Sarayashiki Junior High School and is always trying to usurp Yusuke Urameshi`s position as the toughest. He develops feelings for the ice apparition, Yukina, though it becomes difficult since she remains oblivious of them, mainly from having been raised in a single gendered culture. Kuwabara is fiercely loyal to the the people closest to him, such as his trio of friends, as well as the other members of the Spirit Detectives.
name: Kuwabara Kazuma
